page.title: 02LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content:
THE OLD SCHOOL. The Old School is about 180 years old. It is now disused,and the windows have planks of wood across them.It is in Church Road,near the church.The steps up to it are all overgrown.It is made out of limestone.
YATTON HALL. Yatton Hall is a hospital for mentally handicapped people.It is very big and has lots of exits.It has about five floors and it has about 100 rooms in it.It has a swimming pool quite near to it for patients.It has lots of corridors and doors.
THE BUTCHER'S ARMS. This is the oldest building in Yatton because the stone masons who built the 12th century church lodged there.
